about_the_game:
ABOUT

Join the Law is an strategic FPS team-based game.
You can open the game and be ready to shoot some players and become one of the best! If you want to become one of the best players, you can make a team with your friends or create a team along the way with the help of the chat function. Once you have a team you just need training and a winning strategy and you will be ready to break the charts.For the moment the game has 5 maps and 7 game modes ready to be played.
The story behind the game is simple, one of the teams(Police) try to stop the other team(Thieves).

FEATURES

  • Anti-Cheat And Reporting:This system increase the security of the game by lettin players to report the suspicious ones and also by an advace automatic anti-cheat system.
  • Customizable Weapons:It allows you to change any attachment of any weapon in such a way that you get the best experience possible.

  • Customizable Loadout:There are 4 Different Classes: Assault, Recon, Support, Engineer; And you can customize the load of each class as you wish.
  • Shop:In-Game shop where you can buy the latest skins for weapons and characters with in-game currency and also by playing and evolving in the game.
  • Level System:By playing the game you increase your level and get all kinds of cool stuf like: new weapons and cool skins for them, in-game currency, etc.
  • 7 languages:English, Spanish, French, Russian, Italian, Portuguese and Romanian.
  • Clan System:This feature let you and your friends create a clan and start to compete with the other ones.

GAME MODES

  • Free For All
  • Team Deathmatch
  • Gun Race
